title: Ratatouille lasagne
description: Here's a shortcut family lasagne that’s ready in just 45 minutes. Cottage cheese makes it a healthier option, plus you don’t need to make the traditional cheese sauce. Serve with a green salad or sweetcorn for even more of your five-a-day. Equipment: you'll need a 20x28cm/8x11in ovenproof dish
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
